strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a simple Google Desktop Gadget
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Hello World Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2006 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget displays the text 'Hello World' on top of a picture using the main.xml design file. If the text is clicked on, a message box will show up as an event.
